--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

DRAWABLE: poly

Settings

  • fill (default = true) - whether or not the poly should be filled.
  • style (default = null) - the style override for this poly. If none is specified then the style of the T5.PolyLayer is used.

Methods

resync(view)

Used to synchronize the points of the poly to the grid.
